TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Canvas extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel
.class public auto ansi Canvas extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel

summary.span: 定义一个区域，可在其中使用相对于 区域的坐标以显式方式来定位子元素。

span.span: Defines an area within which you can explicitly position child elements by using coordinates that are relative to the area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 对象的集合，这些对象在 属性中。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 是无固有布局特征的唯一面板元素。 is the only panel element that has no inherent layout characteristics. 的默认 和 属性均为零，除非它是自动调整其子元素大小的元素的子元素。A has default and properties of zero, unless it is the child of an element that automatically sizes its child elements. 永远不会调整 的子元素的大小，而是将其定位在其指定坐标处。Child elements of a are never resized, they are just positioned at their designated coordinates. 这为不需要或不需要固有大小限制或对齐的情况提供了灵活性。This provides flexibility for situations in which inherent sizing constraints or alignment are not needed or wanted. 对于希望自动调整子内容大小并对齐的情况，通常最好使用 元素。For cases in which you want child content to be automatically resized and aligned, it is usually best to use a element. 属性确定共享同一坐标空间的子元素出现的顺序。The property determines the order in which child elements that share the same coordinate space appear. 一个子元素的 值越高，表示此元素将显示在具有较低值的另一个子元素之上。A higher value for one child element indicates that this element will appear above another child element that has a lower value. 如果指定这些属性，则附加属性 或 优先于 或 属性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. 始终为 的子元素提供所需的完整大小。Child elements of a are always given the full size that they desire. 因此，垂直对齐方式和水平对齐方式在 内无效。As a result, vertical alignment and horizontal alignment have no effect inside a . 是顶级布局控件，可用于子内容的绝对定位。 is a top-level layout control that you can use for absolute positioning of child content. 对于绘制和绘制，使用画笔，无需使用 。For painting and drawing, you use brushes and do not have to use a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[采用纯色和渐变进行绘制概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). 默认情况下，panel 元素不接收焦点。By default, panel elements do not receive focus. 若要强制 panel 元素接收焦点，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例生成三个 元素，每个元素100像素。The following example produces three elements, each element 100 pixels. 第一个 为红色，其左上角（*x，y*）的位置指定为（0，0）。The first is red, and its upper-left (*x, y*) position is specified as (0, 0). 第二个 为绿色，其左上角的位置为（100，100），这正好位于第一个正方形的右下方。The second is green, and its upper-left position is (100, 100), which is just below, and to the right of, the first square. 第三个 为蓝色，其左上角的位置为（50，50）。The third is blue, and its upper-left position is (50, 50). 因此，第三个 覆盖第一个 的右下象限和第二个的左上部。Hence, the third covers the lower-right quadrant of the first and the upper-left quadrant of the second. 由于第三个 是最后布局的，因此它看起来是在另两个正方形的顶层，也就是说，重叠部分采用第三 的颜色。Because the third is laid out last, it appears to be on top of the other two squares - that is, the overlapping portions assume the color of the third . [!code-csharp[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/CSharp/Canvas_Ovw_Sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/VisualBasic/canvas_vb.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/XAML/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示元素底部与其父 底部之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子元素 偏移量不会影响父 的大小。The offset of a child element does not affect the size of a parent . 如果指定这些属性，则附加属性 或 优先于 或 属性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
